graph_subs

```{r }
g_sub <- tribble(
  ~word, ~subs,
  "The Great Reset", "Great Reset",
  "World Economic Forum", "WEF",
  "W.E.F.", "WEF"
)



#' substitute node columns (columns 1 and 2) of a graph dataframe with a dictionoary of substitutions
#'
#' @export
graph_subs <- function(DF, df_subs) {
  col_names <- colnames(DF)
  subs <- tibble::deframe(df_subs)

  DF |>
    dplyr::mutate(
      !!col_names[1] := stringr::str_replace_all(!!sym(col_names[1]), subs),
      !!col_names[2] := stringr::str_replace_all(!!sym(col_names[2]), subs)
      # n1 = stringr::str_replace_all(n1, subs),
      # n2 = stringr::str_replace_all(n2, subs)
    )
}

graph_subs(graph_GR, g_sub)
```
